page.title: 02Fernhurst Village.
page.content: Fernhurst Village. The village of Fernhurst straddles the main road which links Midhurst in Sussex with Haslemere in Surrey.The older part of the village round the village green is to the east of the main road and it is separated from the more recently developed parts of Fernhurst by the said main road.Some 3000 people live in the parish of Fernhurst which is linked with Camelsdale to the north for local government purposes.The main buildings of importance in the village are the church,the school,a shopping centre made up of a variety of small shops located centrally in the village together with a sub-post office,garage,village hall and oil depot.The surrounding land is beautiful wooded countryside,an area of outstanding natural beauty.
